rows.label: qst702805_msg0001
rows.name:
Morumo, we all know how
dedicated you are to your work.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0002
rows.name:
Would you please tell us?
What is this dream that you're
chasing so desperately?

rows.label: qst702805_msg0004
rows.name:
This shopping district is...
everything to Morumo, mo.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0005
rows.name:
To beat the Pyrithium Trade Guild and
make this the number one commercial
city... That is Morumo's dream, mo!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0006
rows.name:
And for that, you don't care
what kind of goods you handle,
or how anyone feels?

rows.label: qst702805_msg0007
rows.name:
Y-you need money to make a
dream come true, mo! Morumo
is not in the wrong, mo!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0008
rows.name: You can say that in your sleep, mo.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0009
rows.name:
No matter how wonderful the dream,
if the means are twisted, the
result will be twisted too, mo!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0010
rows.name: B-be quiet, mo! Who are you?!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0011
rows.name:
I don't have a name to give a
fool, mo! It's spanking time, mo!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0012
rows.name: Wait, Macmac.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0013
rows.name: Why, mo?!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0014
rows.name: You just said it yourself.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0015
rows.name:
If you want to do things
right, you can't just force
your own opinions on others.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0016
rows.name:
You already know that,
don't you, Morumo?

rows.label: qst702805_msg0017
rows.name:
...Morumo betrayed everyone,
mo. I don't deserve to be
treated so kindly, mo.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0018
rows.name:
I know what I did, mo...
There's nothing left but
to die and atone, mo!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0019
rows.name: Chairman!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0020
rows.name: What's wrong? It's dangerous up there!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0021
rows.name: ...Mo mo?

rows.label: qst702805_msg0022
rows.name:
Are you still mad I ate your
sweet potato snack, mo?! I
won't do it again, mo!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0023
rows.name:
I don't know what happened, but
we owe the chairman a big one!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0024
rows.name:
Now it's our turn to help! You can
count on us, don't be a stranger!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0025
rows.name:
I will take responsibility
for your mistake this time.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0026
rows.name: Mo mo?! Th-that's...

rows.label: qst702805_msg0027
rows.name:
Morumo needs to liven up
this shopping district many
times over, the right way.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0028
rows.name:
This is also a form of
closure. I don't think it
will be an easy path, but...

rows.label: qst702805_msg0029
rows.name:
You're not alone. You can
do it, right, Morumo?

rows.label: qst702805_msg0030
rows.name: Adel-sama...

rows.label: qst702805_msg0031
rows.name: Mo mo... I'm so sorry, mo!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0032
rows.name:
Macmac? You have the
confiscated red pollen orbs.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0033
rows.name:
We "happened" to have collected
them. Is that right?

rows.label: qst702805_msg0034
rows.name:
Adel-sama is so sweet, mo.
Sweeter than a sweet potato, mo!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0035
rows.name:
But... I understand, mo. Macmac's
justice is with Adel-sama, mo.

rows.label: qst702805_msg0036
rows.name:
From now on, Macmac will take
responsibility for watching
over the foolish Morumo, mo!

rows.label: qst702805_msg0037
rows.name: Mo mo?! Wh-what was that, mo?!
